column2:
"Thanks for going and asking them. Their answers weren't exactly what I was expecting, but...
I think I can use what I got."
"I was surprised how... unique... they were. Are all the class reps like that?"
"Still, getting a variety of perspectives is a good thing. I'll have to thank them in person next time I see them."

"In the end...
I guess I'll just have to figure out the best way to become stronger myself. Thanks for your help!"
